city: Camp Between Broad River And The Catawba
description: Lord Cornwallis having been so reduced by a severe fever as to be still unable to write, he has desired that I should have the honour of addressing your Excellency in regard to our present situation.

city: Camp Between Broad River And The Catawba
description: I stated the events which had frustrated our hopes of penetrating into the heart of North Carolina, and arming the loyalists in our cause
We therefore attacked Greene at 10 o'clock this morning.
